definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The script could be improved by displaying the picks in a Keno-style board.
sentences.chinese: 可以通过在基诺样式板中显示选择结果来改进脚本。

sentences.english: Creates an instance of a scriptable object with T.
sentences.chinese: 创建一个带有T参数脚本化对象的实例。

sentences.english: Helper classes allow you to add functionality to your test scripts.
sentences.chinese: 助手类允许您将功能添加到您的测试脚本中。

sentences.english: We have rewritten all the sample scripts to cover the new benchmark.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经重写了所有示例脚本，以覆盖新的基准。

sentences.english: After seeing how vulnerable these scripts are to hackings and holes.
sentences.chinese: 在看出这些脚本对黑客和漏洞是多么脆弱之后。

sentences.english: You may need to add synchronization into your other two scripts.
sentences.chinese: 您可以将同步化添加到您另两个脚本中。

sentences.english: To do this, you essentially need a rollback script for every change.
sentences.chinese: 为此，实际上每个更改都需要一个回滚脚本。

sentences.english: After the boot countdown, the system automatically invokes the boot script.
sentences.chinese: 引导开始倒计时时，系统自动调用引导脚本。

sentences.english: Consider creating scripts to automate the regular maintenance of queue managers.
sentences.chinese: 考虑创建脚本来自动化队列管理器的定期维护。

sentences.english: Draft a script to guide your shoot.
sentences.chinese: 草拟一个脚本用于指导你的拍摄。

sentences.english: Gets the starting column of a script block in the generated source file.
sentences.chinese: 获取生成资源文件中某个脚本块的起始列。

sentences.english: Note that the script displayed is editable.
sentences.chinese: 注意，所显示的脚本是可编辑的。

sentences.english: You can customize this script based on your setup.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据自己的设置定制这个脚本。

sentences.english: Here is a sample output of this script.
sentences.chinese: 下面是这个脚本的一个示例输出。

sentences.english: It takes configuration scripts as input, and then takes actions based on these scripts.
sentences.chinese: 它获取配置脚本作为输入，然后根据这些脚本来行动。

definition: plug-in (software or hardware)/to plug in a component
